author: tabish
msg: Refactor the platform detection and configuration section to account for platforms not using the GCC compiler toolset.

author: arkurth
msg: Updated the README file.  Moved Perl modules required for Jabber to conditional section.  Changed URLs of Perl modules to the "permalink" addresses provided by cpan.org.  Changed "Perl 5.8.0 or later" to "Perl 5.8.x" because problems may occur if Perl 5.10 or other later versions are used.
